item.title: U.S. Stocks Fall Ahead of Fed Meeting
item.description: Major U.S. stock indexes fell as the Federal Reserve was due to begin its two-day rate-setting meeting.

item.title: Natural Gas Prices Fall Amid Mild Temperatures
item.description: Warm U.S. weather drove down natural gas prices, despite some expectation of lower temperatures in January providing a respite.

item.title: Food Fight With Kroger Spells Trouble for Albertsons
item.description: Albertsons faces daunting challenges as a stand-alone company.
